name: Plastic Surgery Conference 2024
content: The world's top plastic surgeons will come together at the 10th Global Meeting on Plastic, Aesthetic and Reconstructive Surgery on June 27-28, 2024 in London, UK to share their knowledge with peers from all around the world. It will continue the theme Novel Approaches and Techniques in Plastic and Aesthetic Surgery. For both domestic and foreign Plastic Surgeons, it is the year's premier educational and networking meeting.
